wikipedia_page.main: Sonia Wild Bićanić OBE (née Wild, 3 January 1920 – 5 December 2017) was an English academic, author and translator whose numerous publications cover topics in the literature, history and culture of both Great Britain and Croatia.

link_mentions.page: List of Somerville College, Oxford, people
response: *Sonia Bićanić OBE (1920–2017), literary academic, author and translator
